Network Security

Company: Reliance Industries Limited
Location: Navi Mumbai, Maharashtra, India
LinkedIn post
We have an excellent opportunity for the role of Network Security, based out of Navi Mumbai Location. Interested applicants can apply to below given job description -

Responsibilities

Perform the security assessment on telecom infrastructure to cover the security aspects like architecture security, application security, vulnerability management, MBSS controls, protocol security and security tools integrations.

Discuss the findings and mitigation procedures with planning team and Vendor for the necessary closure.

Analyse the vulnerabilities in order to appropriately characterize threats and provide remediation advice. Familiarity with classes of vulnerabilities, appropriate remediation, and industry-standard classification schemes (CVE, CVSS, CPE).

Initiate and conduct a complete walk through session for New solution/New Node/Patch/Release and understand the systems functionality and architecture from security aspects.

Work closely with different stakeholders to initiate security assessment in Lab, publish reports and track it to closure and ensure the fix is rolled out in production.

Conducts regular penetration testing on telecom infrastructure and identify security gaps and tracking it to closure.

Ensure 100% periodic assessment annually of all the Telecom network elements. Publish reports to respective stakeholders and track them to closure within the timelines.

Conduct the security Audits with external regulatory bodies like DoT as per license conditions.

Understand different aspects of regulatory guidelines from DoT on telecom w.r.t security of the network and organization.

Protection Measures for Telecom Network: Prevent any hacking or data leak attacks against Jio from succeeding.

Work Experience

Work experience in vulnerability management.

Work experience in security of Embedded Linux and different types of OS.

Conducted internal and external audits as per ISO 27001:2013 and regulatory bodies as DoT.

Experience of VMware technology, Dockers, Kubernetes architecture.

Understanding of Telecom network

Understanding of OSI,TCP/IP layers and communication protocols

Competencies /Expertise Required (Functional & Behavioral)

Specialization course in Cyber Security, Certification for ISO 27001:2013, CEH

Systematic problem-solving skills, with the ability to think.

Excellent in analytical thinking for translating data into informative visuals and reports.

Adaptable to change.

Quick Learner Open learn and work on new technologies and products
  • All the job profiles are publicly listed on recruitment platforms
